directions: Combine all ingredients in 1-1/2-quart baking dish. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Remove cover and bake an additional 15 minutes or until squash is tender.
ingredients: 1/4 cup I Can't Believe It's Not Butter!® Spread, melted
1 (1- 3/4) pound butternut squash, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
title: Butternut Squash with Apple and Cranberries
